items.title: Revamp README with Latest AI Services in Nexior ðŸš€
items.summary: The README has been updated to include newly supported AI services, enhancing clarity for users. Key additions include Gemini and Claude for AI Chat, Seedream for AI Image, and Seedance for AI Video, with updates made in both English and Chinese sections. This ensures that users have the most current information on available features and applications.

items.title: Enhance error handling for image processing in Platform Service ðŸš€
items.summary: This update improves error handling in the image processing workflow by adding a try-catch block in the core functionality. It ensures that any errors during the image URL processing are logged and a clear error message is thrown. Additionally, a minor adjustment in the utility function now directly returns the original URL when certain conditions are met.

items.title: Enhance flux size handling in Platform Service ðŸš€
items.summary: This update modifies the FluxImagesHandler to improve the handling of image size parameters. A new size parameter has been added to the request body, allowing for more flexible image generation options. The changes enhance the robustness of the request validation process.
